title: HELP PLEASE IM BEGGING YOU!
content:
CAN SOMEONE PLEASE HELP ME FIND THE FONT CALLED "BELLE" BY EMILY DARNELL FOR FREE?? It would literally make my day! AGAIN I NEED IT FOR FREE!!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20130821044026im_/http:/typophile.com/files/blog_5767.png)
author: lovetennis85

comments.content:
SORRY WE DON'T LIKE IT WHEN PEOPLE YELL AT US ASKING FOR FREE STUFF.

(Especially when it only costs $5: [http://www.youworkforthem.com/product.php?sku=T0196&a\_aid=c5fc6cfc&a\_bid...](http://web.archive.org/web/20130821044026/http:/www.youworkforthem.com/product.php?sku=T0196&a_aid=c5fc6cfc&a_bid=36c0cafd "http://www.youworkforthem.com/product.php?sku=T0196&a\_aid=c5fc6cfc&a\_bid=36c0cafd") )
